headline: Cencora CEO Insider Sale Extends Selling Trend Despite Valuation Upside
summary: Cencora (NYSE:COR) President & CEO Robert Mauch recently sold company shares in an insider transaction. The sale extends a year long pattern of insider selling at Cencora, with no disclosed insider share purchases over the same period. The activity comes at a time when investors are closely watching insider moves across the healthcare distribution sector. Cencora, a large pharmaceutical and healthcare products distributor, sits at the center of drug supply chains that link manufacturers,...
